name.value: Warhammer 40,000 (Second Edition): Codex – Sisters of Battle

item.description:
The Warhammer 40,000 Codex books contain the complete rules for playing various armies in Warhammer 40,000. They also contain in-depth painting guides, army lists, and much more.


The Codex: Sisters of Battle is an expansion book for the Games Workshop Table Top game Warhammer 40,000. This book was published for the first time in 1997, and is for the 2nd Edition of Warhammer 40,000.

The title of the Codex is Codex Sisters of Battle.

The book has 64 pages and the cover is printed in color while the majority of the book remains in black and white, although there are several pages of colour images of miniatures.

Contents

Army List: This book contains a complete army list for using a Sisters of Battle army. Further special rules and equipment is included.
